text: Teuma kheun Musa wahe ya Allah Ka Neubri mewah that keu Peura ªun Ngon kawomjih nyan hana ban peugah Areuta jih le lam udep donya ! Wahe Rabbana jipubuet salah Dum manusia jijak peusisat Bak jalan teupat han jibri langkah Wahe Po kamoe areuta jihnyan Neusampoh bandum beuanco bicah Neutop atejih bek jimeuiman Meugoh jikalon azeub that leupah Mangat jikalon azeub peudeh that
